description:
webkit_support: Initialize the logger with the same setting with
test_shell.

BUG=none
TEST=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=53303

messages.text:
LGTM

http://codereview.chromium.org/3014020/diff/1/2
File webkit/support/webkit_support.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3014020/diff/1/2#newcode138
webkit/support/webkit_support.cc:138: log_filename = log_filename.AppendASCII("DumpRenderTree.log");
Nit: I wonder if we should include the pid in the filename so we don't have to lock the log file?  Maybe that will just put a bunch of junk in the build output dir.  I don't have a strong opinion either way.

http://codereview.chromium.org/3014020/diff/1/2
File webkit/support/webkit_support.cc (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3014020/diff/1/2#newcode138
webkit/support/webkit_support.cc:138: log_filename = log_filename.AppendASCII("DumpRenderTree.log");
On 2010/07/21 17:11:21, tony wrote:
> Nit: I wonder if we should include the pid in the filename so we don't have to
> lock the log file?  Maybe that will just put a bunch of junk in the build output
> dir.  I don't have a strong opinion either way.

I'm afraid it makes a lot of log files and waste disk space on buildbots.
I committed this patch without this pid proposal.

subject: webkit_support: Initialize the logger with the same setting with...
